document.full_text: kristen stewart, taylor lautner and other actors filming the upcoming "twilight" installment "breaking dawn" have been forced to evacuate the vancouver island beach area in british columbia.
document.title: "twilight" cast evacuated in tsunami warning
lines_and_colors: kristen stewart, taylor lautner and other actors filming the upcoming "twilight" installment "breaking dawn" have been forced to evacuate the vancouver island beach area in british columbia.
